main event: A witness observed a round, dark silhouette against the sky near Joshua Tree, California, in 1953.
interesting points: The object was estimated to have a diameter of 40 to 50 feet and emitted a prominent light from its surface., The sighting lasted about 15 to 20 seconds., The object was observed while watching an airplane, which directed their attention upward., The object disappeared rapidly into haze as it moved away., Previous sightings in the same area were reported, including a similar object hovering for several minutes.
sighted object: circular dark object in the sky
witness description: The witness was a 43-year-old male radar operator with specialized training.
